text: ineziyami kebefitachewi agerituni menoriya yadereguti iminetinimi yelemeduti wede’inerisu yetesededutini sewochi yiwedalu፡፡ (sidetenyochu) keteset’utimi negeri belibochachewi wisit’i k’iretani ayagenyumi፡፡ be’inerisu layi chigiri binoribachewimi benefisochachewi layi lelawini yimerit’alu፡፡ yenefisunimi nifigeti yemit’ebek’i sewi ineziya inesu minyotachewini aginyiwochi nachewi፡፡
